item.title: Initial Claims
item.description: Here are initial-claims data, which were covered in a recent NY Times article. I try and replicate a few of the figures detailed in the article. Data on initial claims are available at FRED by browsing data by Category > Population, Employment, & Labor Markets > Weekly Initial Claims and selecting Initial Claims. Here is the R code for retrieving and plotting these data. Data on initial claims from March are highlighted in orange.
